description
=========================
LEGO Star Wars II : The Original Trilogy is a continuation of one of the slickest entertainment electronic products of 2005 which was a resounding success for many quite a big surprise because even for frequently linked to games under the sign of the Star Wars mediocrity . The work of the studio Traveller's Tales managed to overcome the unfavorable market trend and gain the recognition of customers of all ages. The famous Danish manufacturer of plastic blocks , encouraged commercial triumph LSW , decided once again to license said the British company and it is in this way, the " deuce " .

According to subtitle this time the developers have focused on three episodes of the Star Wars film series , filmed by George Lucas in 1977-1983 . We therefore have the opportunity to see in virtual reality , of course, built with characteristically looking LEGO elements , the most famous scene from A New Hope (New Hope ) , The Empire Strikes Back ( The Empire Strikes Back ) and Return of the Jedi ( Return of the Jedi ) . Of course we see also in the form of shares of tens likes of Luke Skywalker , Darth Vader , Han Solo , R2D2 etc . It is worth noting that our representative on the screen can also be a hero whose composition isolated from blocks ( number of combinations indeed dizzy ) . In addition, holders of the selected hardware platforms (eg PS2) received an option to use a saved game from the first LEGO Star Wars , which allows for the inclusion of fun over fifty bonus adventurers (including Mace Windu , Qui -Gon Jinn and Darth Maul ) .

Exploring the virtual world not only by foot , but also moving several different machines (even cosmic fighters Class X-wing ), and even using mounts ( big lizards race from the planet Tatooine dewback and other unusual animals ) . Of course, we do not need to stay alone in the universe of Star Wars , as the authors have prepared a multiplayer mode that allows cooperation. As far as the available weapons, it naturally offered , for example, energy blasters , thermal detonators and of course Power ( choke , lightning shocks , etc.). It should be noted that now every hero is able to construct useful items of blocks which are found during his journey.
